verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: Found in Your hands, fullness of joy newline Every fear suddenly wiped away here in Your presence newline All of my gains now fade away newline Every crown no longer on display, here in Your presence newline Heaven is trembling in awe of Your wonders newline The kings and their kingdom arestanding amazed

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Here in Your presence, we are undone newline Here in Your presence, Heaven and Earth become one newline Here in Your presence, all things are new newline Here in Your presence, everything bows before You

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: Wonderful, beautiful, glorious, matchlessin every way newline Wonderful, beautiful, glorious, matchlessin every way
